website_summaries.verdict: This device goes on like a backpack and cues slouching back and shoulders to hold better posture.
pros: Reduces pain in the back, neck and collarbone
Armpit pads and leather inserts help improve stability
Designed for wearing discreetly under a loose top
cons: Can be uncomfortable against the skin if you wear it under a shirt

customer_reviews.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
customer_reviews.text: I have had some reoccurring neck and upper left shoulder pain and I attributed that issue to sitting at my desk and slouching. After purchasing this product and wearing it daily for around 2 hours, the pain has subsided dramatically as the posture correctors unnoticeable improvement on how my shoulders align under my ears. The recommendation is to wear the product 15-30 minutes a day but I have wearing mine for 2 hours daily. The only downside that I can comment on is if you attempt to wear the product under your shirt so it's not noticeable while at work, it will uncomfortably rub into your skin so my suggestion is to wear it over a shirt (with sleeves).
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN S PFEFFERLE

customer_reviews.title: not cheaply made like so many of the posture correctors sold on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I received straps that were too small so I contacted Vibo Care and Alex was extremely professional and resolved my issue in no time at all. This posture corrector is a durable and top-quality strap, not cheaply made like so many of the posture correctors sold on Amazon. I rate this product 10/10 and highly recommend this product to improve your posture and/or solve your back pain issues. A++++ all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Einar

customer_reviews.title: No more hunchback
customer_reviews.text: I have used to different posture correctors. This one is by far more comfortable. It's made of a breathable high quality material. The fabric is soft and doesn't rub. The Velcro is on the end of the straps so it doesn't grab on to your clothing and makes it very adjustable. I am glad I gave this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: and the size adjusts great. very useful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: it was hard at first, getting used to this, but now I totally depend on it. it keeps me from slouching too much, and the size adjusts great. very useful and easy to use. also the company/seller has been very nice and always making sure I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Too small.  Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Am 6 feet tall and weigh 182 pounds. At its maximum, too small.
customer_reviews.author: WAN2

customer_reviews.title: I needed to keep my posture upright to help with ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to keep my posture upright to help with back pain. The posture corrector is very helpful in providing the support and tension to keep proper posture and alignment. It takes a bit to get used to as I'm not used to standing so straight but it is helping to alleviate pai
customer_reviews.author: green

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product from a small business who cares about customer satisfaction. I’ve ordered a lot of things from Amazon but have never received follow up emails to check to see if everything was good. This company is on top of it! Wore the corrector today for about an hr on bare skin (not what they recommend) with t-shirt on top to hide it. Felt fine and seems like it’s going to help a lot. Easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Still testing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my posture because therapy didn't work. So for my honest review, Its kinda hard to put the harness on. Also its a bit uncomfortable but i only want to wear it at home so i am willing to do what it takes. I wear it for about 4 hours at a time. If it had something to wrap around the waste possibly to keep it from moving up the back and down in the front. That would be helpful. So i gave a three star due to the fitment of it. I am and will continue to use to try to help with thoracic back pain between my shoulder blades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: difficult to put on and off
customer_reviews.text: This is why I don't like this item. It is very difficult to put on and take off. It took me almost 10 minutes to take it off and I seriously thought I was going to have to cut it off with a knife that's how difficult it was to take off. Not suggest buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie zheng

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: do not like it because of the low quality of the product. I think I won't wear it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: This is a crutch but it is there to remind you that good posture really does make a difference
customer_reviews.text: It is uncomfortable, but it should be. I used this and also started working out more to strengthen my muscles. Within 3 months of usage I found that my hunch had gone away considerably but it will always come back if you lack exercise and mindfulness. This is a crutch but it is there to remind you that good posture really does make a difference, I've felt better and you should too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Kantz

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and I still slouch
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised at all the reviews saying this keeps you from slouching. It definitely doesn't, and it's really uncomfortable where it loops under my arms. I thought at first maybe I was too small and came back to double check the recommended chest dimensions, but I fall into the right measurements. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable straps that dig into your armpits
customer_reviews.text: I understood that the feeling of this may not be the most comfortable afterall you are trying to correct bad posture. However, that being said I can’t say whether or not this product actually works because I couldn’t get past the most most uncomfortable side straps/tabs that dig into your armpits. After trying to readjust multiple times it still was painful. This didn’t even allow me to keep it on for more than a few minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: We have a winner.
customer_reviews.text: I am a board certified chiropractic orthopedist with over 30 years of clinical experience. Now, more than ever before, I am seeing people with postural complaints related to excessive computer usage. I have access to every postural correction brace out there and have tried many of them. This is by far the best brace I have found to date. Comfortable to wear for extended periods of time, well made with high quality materials and easy to get on and off. You can buy this support with confidence. It is well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Weapon

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and painful design
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was excited to try this but I’ve tried to wear it several times only to take it off after just a few minutes. It is extremely uncomfortable under your arms and digs in. So while it might relieve some back discomfort, it is going to give you raw and painful pits. Save your armpits and just do some posture exercises and weight training. It will work more effectively and build the muscles you need to stay upright. This product is a bandaid and a poor one at that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable but works.
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for a couple days and couldn’t stand the uncomfort under my pits. It’s too tight and I made sure I wore it correctly. I read the instructions, followed the steps in the video and even contacted customer service about this issue. It’s just the way it’s meant to be worn I guess. One GREAT thing about this is that it definitely fixed my back problem right away. I had persistent pain in my neck, shoulders and upper back that this was able to completely get ride of.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: A well made product.
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made but it did not work for me. I am sure it would help others whose condition was perhaps not as advanced as my own.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: NO WAY TO PUT IT ON YOURSELF
customer_reviews.text: This product works fine - unfortunately, the straps are not long enough for a standard sized adult - if you put it on as a backpack per instructions, one cannot reach around back for the strap - consequently, one always needs help to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Zinchen

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was great! I was confused with the product at first ...
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great! I was confused with the product at first and thought that a part was missing. I emailed and they got back to me within 24 hours. My confusion was cleared up as they provided pictures and instructions to help me out. I have used the product a few times and it seems to be helping but I will need to use it more often to give a more accurate review.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good for relieving pain from poor posture due to desk work.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent company who go the extra mile for their customers- truly a rare find! I love the posture corrector and surprise gift resistance band. While studying for board exams for long hours each day, this product has been a great help in relieving my back pain. The posture corrector fits as expected, but seeing as my chest size is quite small 30" I would love it if it could be made a bit smaller to accommodate the full breadth of women's frames. Thank you again VIBO care!
customer_reviews.author: HanBan

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my husband
customer_reviews.text: This posture corrector seems to really be helping my husband. He has an office job where he sits most of his day and feels like he’s gradually been slumping at his desk more, creating back pain. He put this on and said it feels comfortable and he can definitely tell a difference as soon as he puts this on. It pulls his shoulders up straight and he feels like he sits / stands taller. He’s been wearing this for about 30mins a day and says he will gradually increase the time until he feels like he’s sitting up straight at work.
customer_reviews.author: szero4

customer_reviews.title: however i have a pretty big chest and lats
customer_reviews.text: Okay so first off this really works, however i have a pretty big chest and lats. This causes the brace to be very uncomfortable, it cuts off circulation to my arms (just a bit) and digs into my armpits enough to be uncomfortable. But like i said above, this brace really does work.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions. With velcro adjustment, you can feel the tightening as you adjust the straps. This gives a nice support as it adjusts your posture gently and gradually. Glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Kwags

customer_reviews.title: Works better for smaller people
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made product, professionally packaged and delivered on time. We bought two of these braces to use for several of my family members who feel they want to improve their posture. Overall the item is good. The one niggle I have is that it seems to work better for smaller people. The folks in my family who are large all find that the back part seems to be riding up, even though we follow directions and initially place it below the shoulder blades. For the skinnier ones it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: A. Khazanovich

customer_reviews.title: Good for issues from office
customer_reviews.text: Good product and good customer attention/care with the product. For reference, I am 5'2", 110 lbs and 32 years old (petite woman) and it adjusts down to what I need. I suffer from shoulder (rotator cuff and biceps) tendinitis and this device is very helpful. As far as lifestyle, I am lightly active but do a lot of office work (own my own business).
customer_reviews.author: Someone Who Buys Things

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and well designed.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a posture corrector. I’ve had terrible posture my entire life and have scoliosis as well. The one I had before was really uncomfortable and bulky. This one is streamlined, really comfortable and easily adjustable. I’ve just started out using it so I’m still only using it 20 to 30 minutes a day, but I actually feel better when I’m wearing it then when I’m not. It does prevent me from slumping when I’m at the computer or doing my art, (my job) I am really looking forward to seeing how it improves my posture. I have been wearing this over my T-shirt, but I think it would be perfectly comfortable underneath a loose shirt as well.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: This product is simply a reminder to keep your posture, not to correct it.
customer_reviews.text: I feel the product is small for my body type. I am semi-husky, so the straps are hardly able to even stick. I had someone tighten and stick the straps for me. From the videos, I liked how it was a one person product. Finally, after wearing the posture corrector, my neck and spine started to spasm. I feel there should be more detail on the possibility of soreness when first using. The product works best when the elbows are down, next to the torso. My shoulders are correctly postured, but there’s no back support to keep me from slouching.
customer_reviews.author: J R H

customer_reviews.title: That be this device will not cure back problems but does ameliorate them.
customer_reviews.text: After using the product for a month, I only wear it when I leave my apartment and paid too much for it. The Velcro at the ends of the straps collects lint, pet hair, whatever. It's a major pain to put on and the buckles move around. It will not cure Kyphosis and pulls the shoulders back only when the straps are pulled as tight as possible. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Zeno Nine

customer_reviews.title: Good product to have if you sit in an office all day
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for couple of weeks now. It takes time to get use to it at first when pulled tight enough. I sit in the office all day long and I have really bad posture. But after I brought this item it helps me sit straight at my seat. Is better than not having it. Hopefully it will reduce my neck and shoulder pain in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ken F.

customer_reviews.title: Really helps posture during gym exercises
customer_reviews.text: I use this when going to the gym to help keep shoulders in place during exercise and avoid 'pushing with my shoulders' instead of muscles. It does cause soreness for the first couple of days - but that goes away and you'll notice that your posture improves even when not wearing the brace.
customer_reviews.author: Gungo

customer_reviews.title: Work as intent
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised. So far I don't have any problems with it yet. However for the skinny people out there, you might have to put some velcro on the center yourself for the straps to attach. It also does not correct the lower back, so if you have the lower back posture problem, then this product is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress Blade

customer_reviews.title: Great posture reminder
customer_reviews.text: My job requires me to sit at a desk for long hours so I needed something to help remind me not to slouch. This product is made of soft material that does not irritate your skin. I stayed wearing it for 20 minutes a day and by the second week I barely remember it's there. Definitely has helped relieve pain.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Patchin

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great service.
customer_reviews.text: The posture corrector is pretty sturdy and easy to adjust. When I couldn't register my product for the warranty and lodged a complaint, the company responded immediately and registered my product. I am quite satisfied with my purchase, I bought it 4 months ago, I've used it regularly and have had a significant reduction in neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Abhiram Pannala

customer_reviews.title: No pain no gain
customer_reviews.text: This posture corrector helps to keep your shoulders aligned but it can make you really sore at first. I guess you never really realize how much you slouch until you put this on. I would recommend to not wear it more than the 15-30 minutes at a time as instructed. It caused a headache and shoulder pain when first using it. After repeated use that went away though. If you don't want to wear it on the outside of your clothes it can be uncomfortable because it rubs your skin. All in all it's a great useful tool and after repeated use it trains you to keep your posture in correct alignment and helps to alleviate neck and shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Helps but very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been having posture/pain issues after recovering from a broken ankle and using a walker and crutches for so many months. This brace helps a bit but is very uncomfortable under and around my arms that I can't wear it for very long. I am using it but wish I had found one that is more comfortable. I gave it a one star on comfort because there isn't a lower rating.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how it does it but...
customer_reviews.text: This brace has significantly reduced my shoulder and neck pain. I work at a desk 10 hours a day and I have two toddlers in the house. I was in pain in my neck and shoulders most of the time. I knew my posture is not correct so I ordered one brace for me and one for my husband. It works great. It certainly corrects the posture but for me the best thing is that this constant pain is gone. I wear it at home for couple of hours at night because I don't like how it looks either if I put it under or over my clothes. Only if I have a cardigan or a jacket to cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Y.

customer_reviews.title: No way
customer_reviews.text: There are too many points of control for this to do anything...maybe it can remind you to self adjust your posture because it so uncomfortable to wear you can’t ignore the thing- so you might just as well correct your posture. I have a rather small frame and narrow shoulders. One size fits everyone = one size fits no one. It just isn’t effective.
customer_reviews.author: Pati

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good. I wore it a lot at the begining. I wore it to work to help me adjust my chair. After a few weeks, I stop using it regularly because I became more conscious of my posture. Occasionally I still put it on to reinforce that feeling. It's did what I wanted. I bet there are cheaper product that will do the same. Once your body is used to the good posture then the usage of the product goes down. But I would recommend this product. It has changed my life for the better.
customer_reviews.author: Lam Pham

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this a five star but there needs to be adjustable padding or cushion on the straps where the come up under the arm and onto the chest. This is made of quality materials and workmanship. It definitely helps to put pressure on your spine to help with posture. If you’re looking for value for cost I’d say this one is worth it. Comes in nice packaging with instructions for use. Can be used under it over clothing. Almost feels like you’re wearing a backpack at first.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dronebarger

customer_reviews.title: Truly is unisex!
customer_reviews.text: This product has no plastic boning in it, and considering that, I can’t believe how effective and non-invasive it is! It’s essentially a backpack mechanism without the backpack; however, it’s so much more as soon as you have it on. My boyfriend tried it as well and agreed that it would be easy to hide under a coat. I think my biggest surprise was that it worked for both of us. I was so skeptical that a product like this could be unisex, but it really was comfortable for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Bird

customer_reviews.title: It is not a permanent solution to correct your posture.
customer_reviews.text: The posture corrector is not comfortable. It forces your shoulders back, somewhat correcting your posture. After a while, it is uncomfortable enough to have to remove it. It forces your posture and makes you aware that it needs correcting. Nevertheless, it does not work strengthening your core which is what you need for a permanent solution. There are exercises that your physical therapist can show you that will have a more permanent solution.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, easy to use and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic next and shoulder problems from a car accident. Dr's have recommended I try this type of support. I am amazed how much it helps. While wearing I feel an immense amount of pressure relieved from my neck and spine. It makes my whole postier chain feel better. I wear it as often as I can each day. My neck pain has improved drastically. I am so thankful for this product and the relief I am finding from it's support. Quality construction, easy to use and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha White

customer_reviews.title: Hope you don't have to return it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I thought it would help my posture/ back pain. When I tried it on, it made my arm/ hands go numb in my right arm. I am returning the product because I cannot use it, but I'm being charged $5.99 to return it. To say I'm a little annoyed would be an understatement
customer_reviews.author: LDewease

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & affordable
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick. Product was made very well, & it’s pretty comfortable for being a corrector. However, as a smaller framed individual (5’5 130lbs) the straps have to be strapped basically behind my shoulder for it to even fit me & not fall off. I really do enjoy using this & again the quality is great for the price. But it’s difficult for someone my size to get it on & off because the adjustability just isn’t there. When I do use this product it does make a difference in my posture which is key anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Mea

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for 15 minutes in the morning and 15 minutes at night. After a few days, I noticed a huge improvement in my posture. My shoulders used to slump forward and my upper back was curved. Now my back is straight. I buy a lot of products from Amazon. This is the best product I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Good for posture correction
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this a few hours a day the past few days and it seems to be working. When we go on daily walks with our dog, I realized that its making me walk with my shoulders up and back straight. Using it few hours a day is making me conscious of my posture when I walk. It might take a while before the posture is corrected completely but this seems to be the first step towards it. If only the straps won’t come off while putting it on, it’ll make a perfect product, but this doesn’t take anything away from the product. Very satisfied with this product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ena

customer_reviews.title: It Does Pull Your Shoulders Back
customer_reviews.text: I can’t state much about comfort and pain relief YET, because I just got this product today 6/22/20. The support of the Posture Corrector does what it says it will do. As I continue to use it each day I will submit another review on how the support and comfort is. I had shoulder replacements and I need help putting it on but other than that it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Marcia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super Supporter!
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with how well this posture corrector worked. My spouse has a lot of back issues and has been having a lot of back pain recently. When I got this product he immediately put it on and went about his daily routine. He was amazed at how little pain he had in both his neck and back at the end of the day. He said it took a little getting used to but now he won't do any work without wearing it. It has been such a lifesaver for him and I'm so glad we found a product that brings him the relief he needs!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Morello

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: I like the snugness of the fit but I feel the under arm padding could be better. Also maybe another clip to run the straps through that the user can see, the only clips to hold the strap are in back and one would either need help putting it on or use a mirror like I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price, worth it for upper back posture
customer_reviews.text: Does seem to help hunched posture, super easy to use, pretty common sense really, has a solid warranty. Only very small draw back is it makes it a bit uncomfortable to get stuff off the floor, not the end of the world and somewhat to be expected. Its light and comfortable and easily worn under a layer so its not obvious to the world. NOT MACHINE WASHABLE. The tag on the brace doesnt say that in words just pictures, only the cards on how to use it says specificly to use cold water and hand wash. Wpuld be nice if that was more obvious since I frequently skip directions.
customer_reviews.author: Sclinton

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: This back straightener was very easier to put on. It is well-made and correct posture immediately making you sit up straight. I was so excited when I first received it and my boyfriend immediately wanted one too. I think it’s a great product and will continue to use This back straightener was very easier to put on. It is well-made and correct posture immediately making you sit up straight. I was so excited when I first received it and my boyfriend immediately wanted one too. I think it’s a great product and
customer_reviews.author: Allie J. S.

customer_reviews.title: It makes me aware that i have a back strap on and has improved my posture
customer_reviews.text: it was very durable , especially as i am throwing this everywhere. It makes me aware that i have a back strap on and has improved my posture - i was surprised by its simplicity and in the ways that it was just easy to wrap around with the velcro. i just wish that everything was padded, not just the shoulder area. it makes me aware even when i sit down but it does cut into my lats. other than that, it's a simple & easy padded shoulders and only wish it was easier to adjust - maybe with a knob or something twisting to tighten or lengthen the strap
customer_reviews.author: shimmering jules

customer_reviews.title: Really helps me stand up straight again.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when I ordered this, but I am so pleased with it and happy I ordered it now. It really helps me keep my shoulders back and upper body straight. At 70 years old, I had gotten the habit of walking in a stoped manner causing my back and neck to hurt. This is really training me all over again how to stand up straight and you don’t have to wear it but a short time each day. Totally recommend this for Seniors.
customer_reviews.author: Pbass

customer_reviews.title: Chronic Sloucher needing support to reduce neck pain.
customer_reviews.text: Chronic sloucher here! I work at a desk all day most of the time and sump a LOT! I wanted something to help improve my posture. This product does the trick. It is small and easy to pack in my purse to bring with me wherever I go. It holds me in a straighter position and has helped to decrease my neck-shoulder pain from the slouching. It did seem to slide up a lot and I found it annoying against my neck However, maybe I just need to readjust the fit to reduce that issue. Still well worth the purchase..
customer_reviews.author: LuLumom

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: I had my family try this to see what they thought and to begin with we all thought we already had great posture or at least not to bad. We were all really wrong. As soon as you put it on, the difference is immediate. It makes you realize the feel of better posture. Some things to take note of: - No bad chemical smells - Completely adjustable and you don't need help to do it - When your putting it on think of putting on a backpack - Make sure you wear it over a sleeved shirt, it hurts to wear it over a tank - Don't wear it for long the first time
customer_reviews.author: Allyria

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. i added a strap to the back as it seemed to be riding up on my back and not as effective. That way I could pull it down and keep it in position. I don't see myself using this an awful lot. I had back surgery and thought it would help me correct my posture as I rehabed.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Armpit irritator
customer_reviews.text: Hi! The product works, let’s say that first. It will definitely pull your shoulders back and help you not slouch. My only negative is the armpits haha I understand there’s only so much you can do for something that hugs your body so close but I’d recommend always having a shirt on under the brace because boy does it ride your armpits.
customer_reviews.author: James Cowart

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic neck and shoulder pain from working a desk job. I've noticed that my neck pain lessons when I am more careful about holding my shoulders back when working out or when sitting at my computer. It's easy to forget about holding your shoulders back when you get focused on other things, so I purchased this product. It arrived yesterday and I am wearing it today. I wore it during my workout and it helped me to keep my shoulders back. So far, it seems to help with keeping me from slumping in front of the computer as well. It does what it's supposed to, so I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: vegcook

customer_reviews.title: very adjustable...so it fits very well.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT EXPECT COMFORT. This item has to fit tight in order to make you alter your posture. That's why it works. I don't like wearing it. It hurts. HOWEVER...I believe it is helping me regain my younger posture. Also, I see why you should start out slowly...with 20 minutes at a time. Comfy? no Valuable? YES! Remember what our folks...and our coaches taught us. Getting and maintaining fitness and good posture is not always comfortable. My mom used to tell my younger sisters, "It hurts to be beautiful." So...you get what you put into it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying and uncomfortable but somewhat helpful...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with an open mind and after giving it a bit of time I've found that it can either be comfortable.... Or not. I have a small hump on my neck which can be quite painful at times and I've been trying to fix my posture and thought that this would help. I personally don't notice much of a difference and find it very uncomfortable most times. I believe this may work for people with poor posture who hasn't developed an issue with their neck and back. I found it more annoying than anything but it is good to have to remind me to pull my shoulders back or sit up straight.
customer_reviews.author: Genessa Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Finally....A pretty comfortable brace!!
customer_reviews.text: This posture correcting brace definitely receives a thumbs up from me. Ones I have tried in the past have been flimsy and useless, this is not the case this time. The brace is fully padded with a memory foam like padding. The only downfall was that it was uncomfortable in the front armpit area and I had to loosen the straps more than I felt was necessary in order to find it comfortable. However, this could change over time as I get used to the product and as my posture corrects itself, so it may or may not be a negative aspect. I look forward to seeing the results as I continue to wear this each day!
customer_reviews.author: E & J Hagler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The VIBO Care Back Posture is everything I wanted it to be. There are basic instructions on the outer package which I can even use to store my product in. I put it on the moment I received it. There is not much of a learning curve and anyone should be able to use it with ease. Included is a small card that should last the tests of time with further reference info for the posture corrector. It tells you how to care for it and even has contact info for the manufacturer to learn more information. I wasn’t uncomfortable wearing it and I can tell that using it as instructed will definitely help my posture in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Christina V.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable straps are padded, which make this harness very comfortable to wear. However it is still thin enough that you could wear it under your clothes. The harness gently pushes your shoulders back and down into a perfect posture position. I do wish the bottom portion of the straps were a little more supported, similar to the top, but I’m nitpicking. I am petite through the shoulders and rib cage and this still fit properly although I was almost at the end of the adjustable strap,
customer_reviews.author: SilvarSwan

customer_reviews.title: After much research, I am glad I chose this one
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about three weeks. I have already seen improvement in my posture and strength in my back. The product is not meant to hold your shoulders in the right position but to remind your shoulders to hold themselves in the right position, which strengthens them, so when you no longer wear the corrector your posture will be correct. I have found the corrector comfortable and not experienced any burning under the arms, but have always worn shirts with sleeves. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Posture Corrector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. Although it does fit him, we had hoped we could share it. It will not go tight enough to fit me (5'4 female). Additionally this is the least comfortable poatire corrector we have owned. It does not have armpit pads- in order to wear it effectively it leaves red raw patches on husband's skin. He does wear it over a shirt (sometimes two) and it still rubs the skin red. Too late to return the item, but we had to purchase him another one.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works
customer_reviews.text: My posture is abhorrent. I have arthritis in my neck which causes chronic migraines. I sit at a computer all day and when my neck begins to hurt, rather than doing the smart thing and sitting up correctly, I find myself curling into the pain—which, of course, eventually makes it worse. In an effort to become more aware of my problem, I began wearing this while I’m at the computer and I’m amazed at how much better I feel at the end of the day. Can you still slouch in it? Yes. But it makes you aware that you’re doing so. It’s not a brace in the traditional sense—but it is working exactly as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R

customer_reviews.title: Not for bigger men
customer_reviews.text: If you are in shape like me (6-2, 215lbs) this product is not for you. The strap doesn't fit me. I was going to return this product, but the seller said they would send me a large size, which I never received. This product will work if you are smaller in size like my wife and son. Both use this, however, will not work for me. Disappointed in the service along with the false and misleading emails from the seller. So, Buyer be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to wear under or over clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any sort of medical posture issue but in pictures I seemed to be slouching. Wearing this device is simple and immediately improved my posture. There are tons of these things on the market but I like this one because of the soft finish and the ease of use. My first use was a little tight. I read the instructions and found that loosening the straps still gave me the posture correction without be restrictive. The materials used are soft and don't cause any form of discomfort even when worn all day. Its a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with posture!
customer_reviews.text: This is an interesting device. I really does help with posture, by providing a gentle reminder to keep your shoulders back. When you keep your shoulders back,it also forces you to straighten your spine. I wore it for several days and it did not interfere with my basic household chores. I had a slightly difficult time wearing it when typing, until I modified my keyboard setup a little, but other than that, it's comfortable, and worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too Small and I'm not that big
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 11" tall and weigh 200 lbs. and this was too small. Every time I got one arm in the strap would pull out of the buckle and I'd have to start all over. It seems well made so I gave it 2 stars, but if you are not small, don't bother buying it as it apparently just doesn't work for anyone that isn't small. I was disappointed that it didn't work as I really wanted to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mender

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with posture
customer_reviews.text: My hubby and son both have scoliosis and this posture corrector has been a blessing to them. They both have only had it a work and they feel like it is helping them with their posture already. They say it’s comfortable and they both do a lot of physical work with our feeding organization and they wear it through all the physical work. Definitely purchase worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Glover

customer_reviews.title: Great for working at a desk ALL day
customer_reviews.text: I was noticing that my posture was not the best, especially when I was working at my desk all day. I would be hunched over my keyboard. I finally took the plunge for this purchase and it is amazing. As soon as I put it on at my desk, I feel immediate relief that I am in the correct upright sitting position. So glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Back Pain!
customer_reviews.text: I've worked behind a desk consistently for the last 6 years and the long hours sitting were really taking a toll on my back and neck. I knew I needed to do something and this was exactly it. After just a couple days I could feel a difference and am looking forward to a long term fix.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've tried yet
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different posture corrector, and this one is by far my favorite. I love that it sits well on my back. Other products have a tendency to ride up, but this stays on placed. The positioning is easy and comfortable. My favorite part has to be the adjustable straps - it's so convenient that they pull up and velcro. It makes it easy for me to wear it by myself. I'm happy to be using this daily to train my posture, and can see a difference!
customer_reviews.author: goldstein07

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in EMS. Lifting patients all day kills your back.For years, I’ve gone to the chiropractor, but thinking of chiropractic care there’s no logical reason why it would work. Pushing on your spine twice a week isn’t going to fix knotted up muscles in your back and even if it could it would take more than 2 adjustments a week to restructure your whole body over time. Putting this on instantly made me feel better. It instantly helped me to stand back into place which in turn made me feel better. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: I use it every once in awhile. It does help the bad posture. The tighter you make it, the better it works. However, when tight, it gets uncomfortable after awhile. Worth it for the price but I'm sure there's better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Helps with posture
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in nice packaging with clear instructions. The shoulder straps are padded which makes it a more comfortable choice. You have to adjust the straps quite a bit if you are a smaller person, causing them to not stay put very well but it is a one size fits all so that is bound to happen. Overall I feel like it helps my posture, when I take the product off i still find myself holding my shoulders straighter.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: If you have bad posture, this is a simple and easy way to train your shoulders to stay back. I am a horrible sloucher and this helps me feel the right way to keep my shoulders back and straight. I know this will help with back and shoulder pain as well as just improve my overall health as I age. Easy to use and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: I'm into day 4 of wearing this as instructed & I already feel a difference. I'm 68 years old & noticed my shoulder slump for quite some time. This product will work that muscle group into shape & create a muscle memory that I hope will last. It feels really good wearing it & when you take it off you can feel you are standing much more straight. I highly recommend using this product as early in life as possible. Its easy to apply & looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5’5” woman 140lbs. The brace was too wide under my arm and cut in badly. I can see you definitely need to get one sized to your body. I couldn’t wear it for over a few minutes even with extra padding under the arms.
customer_reviews.author: Pennie

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my hunched shoulders were causing me chronic neck and shoulder pain. Definitely easy to use. Put it on like a backpack and tighten the straps. I've been using it for about 5 days, and I have noticed that my muscles feel like they are being slowly reprogrammed to not hunch my shoulders forward. And my neck pain is subsiding. So far, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: La Chilena

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, comfortable to wear, and allows full range of motion while wearing it. It fits both me and my husband. We are able to do pretty much anything we want while wearing it. I have already recommended my mom to get one and I hope she does. I recommend anyone to read the instructions before using it just to make sure they are putting it on correctly. I have only used it for a short while and already have high hopes that it will help my shoulder pain from carrying my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jovid

customer_reviews.title: Improves Posture - Make Sure to Follow Instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend actually following the instructions on starting with 30 min a day before increasing. I ignored that and had to take a break as my shoulder started hurting. Once I used it as instructed, I have not experienced any pain, it is comfortable to wear, and it provides some support. It has met my expectations and my posture is improving slowly but surely. My only complaint is it can be difficult to put on. You either have to readjust the straps every time or put some effort in putting it on with straps in position.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Feels better than others I tried, but sizebeeds a little adjustment. Otherwise it's great
customer_reviews.text: This back brace posture is fine. I like it better than others because. It's easy to put on and adjust and doesn't cut into my skin. However with this being said. The straps were too long for me and my liking so I couldn't just leave it at my shoulders it went half way down my back. So I needed help strapping it at a comfortable level for me. This doesn't take away from it too much however because I did wear it and felt comfortable in it just needs to be fixed in a few spots.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good customer support
customer_reviews.text: This is the second posture support product I have used. This one is on par with or better than the previous one I use. It seems like it's of good workmanship and it's easy to use. I appreciate the inserts in the product from the company, to explain how to use it and what their support process is. It seems that the company really cares about supporting its customers, which I highly value. Haven't had to use the customer support yet, but I don't imagine I would be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, too big.
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. It is NOT one size fits all, this product is way to big and uncomfortable for me to wear long enough to see any results.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: helps with upper back pain and I wore it only an hour a day.
customer_reviews.text: It holds your shoulders back and relieved a good amount of my upper back pain just wearing it an hour a day. It does rub a little under the arms, but you can loosen it with the velcro straps, I just wanted it to be as tight as possible to straighten my posture. Its comfortable and not too hard to put on when you figure it out. The velcro makes it easy to adjust the fit and it did relieve some of my upper back pain when I wore it just an hour a day.
customer_reviews.author: Sassydawnb

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my posture
customer_reviews.text: It really helps at work as I’m sitting in front of the computer because I tend to slouch. Never realized how much until I started wearing this. It gently pulls your shoulder back puts you in the right position. Only drawback is I feel like I have to keep adjusting it as it feels like it slips up toward my neck. I tried adjusting the straps but then it was too tight under my arms and was irritating my skin. Minor inconvenience for the benefit I’m getting.
customer_reviews.author: C. Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: Good at first
customer_reviews.text: Only used it two days. Definitely noticed a difference on how I was carrying myself the first day. Seemed to deliver what it promised: posture corrector indeed. Second day, shorty after wearing it, I was walking around all "corrected" and ended up pulling a muscle in my neck. The kind where you can't turn your head all the way, hurts from my shoulder all the way up my neck to my head, up past my ear. Don't think I'm going to be correcting my posture anymore. :(
customer_reviews.author: P. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for regular short uses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to compare to another posture corrector. This is fairly comfortable and not terrible. It is difficult to sometimes adjust on your own and may require some assistance at first. Finding a comfortable place takes trial and error but is not impossible to find. I would also probably not wear for extended periods of time but just to help fix some posture errors. Wearing for short amounts of time regularly seems to be helping adjust my posture.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Mama

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to wear and gives great posture support
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to wear and gives great posture support. I like it's seamless design allowing for wear under a loose sweater or hoodie. I especially recommend this for those who sit at a desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: How to wear the product for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I returned your Prosthetic corrector wait was uncomfortably.Iam. Lt sure that I hasn’t on correctly but your after the purchase video, I.believe, should accompany the product. .that might have helped. Also, a better description of how to wear the product would help. I didn’t want today’s your product negatively because the problem could have been mine plus you have a young company. Years ago, I stated a new company too. Best of luck.
customer_reviews.author: George Prefer

customer_reviews.title: Correct my posture, easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: This posture corrector definitely corrects my posture immediately. I have a lot of neck, back pain and migraines. I have an office job and needs to sit the whole day in front of the computer. After wearing it daily around 2 hours the pain has subsided. The recommendation in the instruction is to wear it 15-30 minutes. For me it is ok to wear it 2 hours. I slowly raised the amount of time. The fabric is soft and the straps are comfortable. They don’t rub my skin. I am glad I gave this product a try. The price is great. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Naddel

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfortable and is Helping a Lot!
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely comfortable and even after wearing it for 5 minutes and removing it, I could feel my shoulders wanting to be in a more correct state. It is easy to put on, seems like it's made of sturdy material, and very, very comfortable. I have horrible posture and my dad and husband are always telling me to stand/sit up straight so I was really excited to try this out and I have to say I really like it! The instructions also are really easy to follow and have pictures for step by step on how to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Marlee

customer_reviews.title: Overall good!
customer_reviews.text: I have scoliosis and have been looking for something to help correct my posture and this looked great. I have actually really enjoyed using it so far and it creates a nice relief from my upper back pain. The one issue I have with it is that if you wear for more than 15 mins (at least in my case) my armpit area gets super sore like if you have started using crutches kind of feeling. I wish it was slightly more padded in that area to help alleviate that soreness but otherwise the product definitely serves its intended purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband since he has back issues. It didn’t help him at all. It made his back hurt more, it has and gives no support. It digs into your under arm. It actually looked to small for my husband when he had it on. Don’t waste your money, wish I didn’t!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One problem
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product that works as advertised once on. Getting it on is sometimes a pain in the butt. The ends of the straps can come out of the slide. Put in on one side and the strap slides out of the other. So it requires the careful contortion of getting both sides on without the strap coming out of either slide. This should be an easy fix. Hopefully that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Posture Corrector
customer_reviews.text: This product works and is well with the money she, I feel so much better during the day. I typically use the product when I wake up in the morning and drink my coffee before I have to get ready for work, usually around 30 to 45 minutes per session. So far it has helped me with my posture and I will continue to use it and recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Really does help you to not slump your shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It helps with holding your shoulders upright and keeps you from slumping over. Like I usually do. It does make your shoulders a bit sir because you are kind of pushing against it at first. But I do think this is a great product and will help my posture. I wish it had an easier way to adjust it. I’m not super flexible and If I don’t have. The straps secured first I can’t grab them to pull them up
customer_reviews.author: karlee

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Great product, delivers what it promises, easy to adjust, just a bit uncomfortable under the armpits, but can be used in a daily basis for a few hours per day. If you need to use it more than a couple of hours per day, it won't be so pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Marcel
